SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT364
SwiftMessageFormat.DescriptiveName: Single Currency Interest Rate Derivative Termination/Recouponing Confirmation
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is exchanged by or on behalf of the institutions or corporates, party A and party B, which have agreed to the termination, partial termination or recouponing of a single currency interest rate swap, a cap, a collar or a floor. The terminated/recouponed transaction is covered by a BBAIRS, ISDA or AFB or another bilateral agreement.
This message may be used to:
a) confirm the details of the partial or full termination of an existing transaction between the parties
b) confirm the details of the recouponing of an existing transaction
c) correct a previously sent termination/recouponing
d) cancel a previously sent termination/recouponing.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36) :

Code.Name: AMND
Code.Description: Replaces a previously sent message with the amended one contained in this message. Used to add settlement agents to an MT 364 previously sent -or- to correct error(s) in an MT 364 previously sent.

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Cancels a previously sent message. Used to cancel an MT 364 sent previously -or- to cancel an MT 364 which contains erroneous information.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Duplicates a previously sent confirmation. Used to inform the Receiver that a confirmation was already sent by telex, fax or SWIFT

Code.Name: NEWT
Code.Description: New confirmation. Used to send an MT 364 for the first time -or- to send a corrected MT 364 when the erroneous one was cancelled using an MT 364 with function CANC.

Validation.Comment: Scope must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36) :

Code.Name: AGNT
Code.Description: The Sender/Receiver is sending/receiving the message on behalf of a third party.

Code.Name: BILA
Code.Description: Bilateral confirmation, ie, theSender and Receiver are the principals.

Validation.Comment: Type must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T93) :

Code.Name: PTRC
Code.Description: The message confirms both the partial termination and recouponing of the transaction. New fixed rates are confirmed and the notional amount is reduced and the payment of a fee may be applicable.

Code.Name: PTRM
Code.Description: The message confirms a partial termination.The notional amount is reduced and the payment of a fee may be applicable.

Code.Name: RCPN
Code.Description: The message confirms the recouponing of the transaction. New fixed rates are confirmed and the payment of a fee may be applicable.

Code.Name: TERM
Code.Description: The message confirms the termination of the transaction. All outstanding obligations are discharged and may result in the payment of a termination fee.

Validation.Comment: Settlement Method must contain the following code (Error code(s): T48) :

Code.Name: NET
Code.Description: All due amounts are to be netted, resulting in a single payment when due dates coincide.

Validation.Comment: Type of Swap must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T47) :

Code.Name: CAPBUYER
Code.Description: Party A bought the cap and paid the premium.

Code.Name: CAPSELLER
Code.Description: Party A sold the cap and received the premium.

Code.Name: COLLARBYER
Code.Description: Party A bought the collar and paid the premium.

Code.Name: COLLARSLLR
Code.Description: Party A sold the collar and received the premium.

Code.Name: FIXEDFIXED
Code.Description: IRS or CS where both parties paid fixed rates.

Code.Name: FIXEDFLOAT
Code.Description: IRS or CS where party A pays fixed and receives floating rates.

Code.Name: FLOATFIXED
Code.Description: IRS or CS where party A pays floating and receives fixed rates.

Code.Name: FLOATFLOAT
Code.Description: IRS or CS where both parties pay floating rates.

Code.Name: FLOORBUYER
Code.Description: Party A bought the floor and paid the premium.

Code.Name: FLOORSLLER
Code.Description: Party A sells the floor and received the premium.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)

In option J, Party Identification must be specified as a list of pairs (Code)(Value) and the following codes and format must be used (Error code(s): T78). Note that optional codes are surrounded by square brackets ('[' and ']') which are not part of the syntax.

Code.Name: ABIC
Code.Description: followed by the BIC/BEI or UKWN if BIC/BEI not known

Code.Name: ACCT
Code.Description: followed by the account number

Code.Name: NAME
Code.Description: followed by the name

Code.Name: ADD1
Code.Description: followed by the first line of the address

Code.Name: ADD2
Code.Description: followed by the second line of the address

Code.Name: CITY
Code.Description: followed by the city (and state, country)

Code.Name: USFW
Code.Description: followed by FedWire Routing Number

Code.Name: USCH
Code.Description: followed by CHIPS UID

Code.Name: GBSC
Code.Description: followed by UK domestic sort code

Code.Name: LEIC
Code.Description: Legal Entity Identifier

Code.Name: CLRC
Code.Description: followed by a clearing code

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T71) :

Code.Name: LAST
Code.Description: The accrual of the (new) interest on the (reduced) notional amount is applicable from the start of the current last calculation periods.

Code.Name: NEXT
Code.Description: The accrual of the (new) interest on the (reduced) notional amount will be applicable as of the next calculation periods.

Code.Name: OTHR
Code.Description: The accrual of the interest is specified in field 37N in the same sequence.

Validation.Comment: Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum number allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03) .

SwiftSequence.Name: B
B
SwiftSequence.Description: Fixed Interest Payable by Party B

SwiftSequence.Name: E
E
SwiftSequence.Description: Fixed Interest Payable by Party A

CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 The message must contain the current fixed interest rate(s). The use of the fixed interest rate sequences depends on the type of the original transaction. Thus, the presence of sequences B and E depends on subfield 1 of field 23A in sequence A(Error code(s): E33)
fieldvalidation.formula: If(In($value, "FLOATFLOAT", "CAPBUYER", "CAPSELLER", "FLOORBUYER", "FLOORSLLER", "COLLARBYER", "COLLARSLLR"), B.$size == 0 && E.$size == 0, If($value == "FIXEDFIXED", B.$size > 0 && E.$size > 0, If($value == "FLOATFIXED", B.$size > 0 && E.$size == 0, B.$size == 0 && E.$size > 0)))
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The message must contain the current fixed interest rate(s). The use of the fixed interest rate sequences depends on the type of the original transaction. Thus, the presence of sequences B and E depends on subfield 1 of field 23A in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 The new fixed rates should only be used in the case of recouponing; the new notional amount should only be used in the case of a partial termination. Thus, taking into account C1: in sequence A, the presence of fields 32G and 22D and, in sequences B and E, the presence of field 37P depend on field 22B in sequence A (Error code(s): E34)
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "PTRC", A[0].F32G.$size > 0 && A[0].F22D.$size > 0 && B.$size > 0 && B[0].F37P.$size > 0 && E.$size > 0 && E[0].F37P.$size > 0, If($value == "PTRM", A[0].F32G.$size > 0 && A[0].F22D.$size > 0 && Implies(B.$size > 0, B[0].F37P.$size == 0) && Implies(E.$size > 0, E[0].F37P.$size == 0), If($value == "RCPN", A[0].F32G.$size == 0 && A[0].F22D.$size > 0 && B.$size > 0 && B[0].F37P.$size > 0 && E.$size > 0 && E[0].F37P.$size > 0, A[0].F32G.$size == 0 && A[0].F22D.$size == 0 && Implies(B.$size > 0, B[0].F37P.$size == 0) && Implies(E.$size > 0, E[0].F37P.$size == 0))))
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The new fixed rates should only be used in the case of recouponing; the new notional amount should only be used in the case of a partial termination. Thus, taking into account C1: in sequence A, the presence of fields 32G and 22D and, in sequences B and E, the presence of field 37P depend on field 22B in sequence A"

fieldvalidation.name: C3-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-1 In sequence L,second intermediary field 86a can only be used if more than one intermediary field 56a is present. (Error code(s): E35):
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence L,second intermediary field 86a can only be used if more than one intermediary field 56a is present."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C3-1 In sequence M,second intermediary field 86a can only be used if more than one intermediary field 56a is present.(Error code(s): E35):
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence M,second intermediary field 86a can only be used if more than one intermediary field 56a is present."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-1
fieldvalidation.comment: C4-1 The currency code in all amount fields must be the same (Error code(s): C02).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The currency code in all amount fields must be the same."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-2
fieldvalidation.comment: C4-2 The currency code in all amount fields must be the same (Error code(s): C02).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The currency code in all amount fields must be the same."

fieldvalidation.name: C4-3
fieldvalidation.comment: C4-3 The currency code in all amount fields must be the same (Error code(s): C02).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The currency code in all amount fields must be the same."

fieldvalidation.name: C5
fieldvalidation.comment: C5 The related reference is required in the case of an amendment or cancellation. Thus, in sequence A, the presence of field 21 depends on field 22A (Error code(s): D02):
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The related reference is required in the case of an amendment or cancellation. Thus, in sequence A, the presence of field 21 depends on field 22A"

fieldvalidation.name: C6
fieldvalidation.comment: C7 In sequence A, if field 22D consists of code OTHR, field 37N must be present (Error code(s): E36)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field 22D consists of code OTHR, field 37N must be present"

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-A Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code(Error code(s): T95).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code"

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-B
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-B This field consists of the bank and location codes (from the ISO Bank Identifier Code) of both the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 364. These codes must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)(Error code(s): T96).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "This field consists of the bank and location codes (from the ISO Bank Identifier Code) of both the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 364. These codes must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-C
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-C Location Code 1 and Bank Code 2 are separated by four digits, which must consist of the year (its last two characters) and month of the termination date in field 30P, in the format YYMM (Error code(s): T22).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Location Code 1 and Bank Code 2 are separated by four digits, which must consist of the year (its last two characters) and month of the termination date in field 30P, in the format YYMM."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-72-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-72-A The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]](Error code(s): T32).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The first line of field 72 should be of the following format: /8c/[additional information]. The remaining lines (2 - 6) should be of the following format: [//continuation of additional information] or [/8c/[additional information]]."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."
